transArray.content: The service at the front desk of the hotel is warm and thoughtful, and all the problems raised are solved attentively. The hotel does not face the street and does not feel very noisy. The overall environment is quite clean. I will choose to stay here next time.

Dear customer, thank you for your recognition of us. Providing you with high-quality services is our philosophy. While providing you with high-quality services, our hotel also has many other features. We have free parking, spacious conference rooms, breakfast buffets, and free laundry rooms that you can use as needed. In your spare time, you can read a book in our reading bar, order yourself a cup of coffee, and enjoy your own warm time. The hotel is adjacent to Chaoyang Station, only about 15 minutes' walk. With Chaoyang Park to the west and Chaoyang Joy City to the east, you can not only enjoy delicious food but also enjoy the scenery. We look forward to your visit again.
